front.title: TSP-TEREDO: Stateful IPv6 over IPv4 Tunnels with NAT using TSP and TEREDO

abstract.t: Teredo [3] is a stateless mechanism to encapsulate IPv6 traffic inIPv4 when there is an IPv4 NAT between the tunnel endpoints. Thisdocument enhances Teredo by providing a stateful IPv6 in IPv4connexion which enables additional features to be used, likepermanent IPv6 address or prefixes. It uses the Tunnel SetupProtocol (TSP) [2] to negociate the parameters of the tunnel andidentify the NAT translation map. TSP also enables negociation andestablishment of prefixes, routing, DNS delegation and otherparameters related to the tunnel.
